-- 老师查询其下所有学生的毕业设计，这里需要返回最新的论文
SELECT s.ID, t.ID AS tID, s.NAME, t.NAME AS tName, SUM(p.isPass = 'tea_pass') AS comment_pass, SUM(p.isPass = 'tea_deny') AS comment_deny, COUNT(p.isPass) AS comment_total FROM undergraduate u JOIN (SELECT t1.studentID, MAX(t1.YEAR * 100 + t1.MONTH) AS max_year_month FROM thesis t1 WHERE t1.tutorID = #{teaID} GROUP BY t1.studentID) t2 ON u.ID = t2.studentID JOIN thesis t ON t.studentID = t2.studentID AND t.YEAR * 100 + t.MONTH = t2.max_year_month JOIN student s ON u.studentID = s.ID LEFT JOIN papercomment p ON p.thesisID = t.ID GROUP BY s.ID, t.ID, s.NAME, t.NAME ORDER BY s.ID ASC;

SELECT s.ID, t.ID AS tID, u.ID as uID, u.stuNumber, s.NAME, t.NAME AS tName, t.fillMiss, SUM(CASE WHEN p.isPass = 'tea_pass' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS comment_pass, SUM(CASE WHEN p.isPass = 'tea_deny' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS comment_deny, SUM(CASE WHEN p.isPass IN ('tea_pass', 'tea_deny', '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS comment_total FROM undergraduate u INNER JOIN student s ON u.studentID = s.ID INNER JOIN thesis t ON t.studentID = u.ID LEFT JOIN papercomment p ON p.thesisID = t.ID WHERE t.start_thesis_id = #{startThesisID} AND t.tutorID = #{tutorId} GROUP BY t.ID ORDER BY t.ID ASC;
